name: Fetch Alerts from SIEM
description: Fetches alerts by querying to SIEM

arguments.name: ElasticSearch

params.query: @timestamp:{ {{vars.huntStartDateTime}} TO {{vars.huntEndDateTime}} } AND event_type:"sysmon" AND event_id:"1" AND (parent_image_path:"C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft Office\\*" OR parent_image_path:"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft Office\\*") AND NOT (image_path:"C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft Office\\*" OR image_path:"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft Office\\*")

steps.name: Query for WMIC XSL Script Processing

params.query: event_type:sysmon AND event_id:1 AND @timestamp:{ {{vars.huntStartDateTime}} TO {{vars.huntEndDateTime}} } AND (image_path:"C:\\Windows\\System32\\wbem\\WMIC.exe" OR image_path:"C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\wbem\\WMIC.exe") AND event_data.CommandLine:*.xsl*

steps.name: Query for MSXSL XSL Script Processing

arguments.name: ElasticSearch

params.query: event_type:sysmon AND event_id:1 AND @timestamp:{ {{vars.huntStartDateTime}} TO {{vars.huntEndDateTime}} } AND (event_data.CommandLine:*.xsl* OR event_data.Product:"Command Line XSLT" OR image_path:"*msxsl.exe") NOT (image_path:"C:\\Windows\\System32\\wbem\\WMIC.exe" OR image_path:"C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\wbem\\WMIC.exe")
